comment: The most amazing, caring and passionate professor I've had. She made a summer graduate class so much easier and less stressful than I thought they would be. I will be taking another one of her classes next semester. Absolutely recommend!

Be prepared that she is a young professor still very much on the "her way or the highway" trend of thinking. Class content was easy enough, but she is generally inaccessible through email and offers little clarification when asked questions one-on-one. She is not a difficult professor, just headstrong and unyielding to students' issues.
Super interesting and fun class. I did not go to class but got intel from the group me, material and lectures were online. Tests are easy peasy too!
